Content:
As some forum members are aware, I'm well into classic motorcycles. With a particular passion for the British bikes.
Norton, Triumph, Sunbeam, or the former Arms Dealer BSA! To name just some.
Having said that, I just had to post this 1929 Indian. It is ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS! Currently on sale here in the UK.
Price: £20,000. Or about $25,300 if anyone wants to bring it home...I'll be buying some lottery numbers this week 😃
